name: Mordent
description:
Overview

Please note that this is still a jam version and the full version for this game will be coming out VERY soon! :D

You're facing your death. You're already nearly 90 years old. As a final act, you decide to go to your place of birth, South America. Walking through the jungle, you find a peculiar stone temple. A skeleton in a black robe approaches you. It's Death himself! He tells you about a bunch of archaeologists heading towards His temple, aiming to raid the place off its treasures. He then asks you to defend the Death Temple in exchange for life.

Features

-100 levels in 5 unique worlds!

-Dozens of traps!

-A deep story!

-Unique, minimalist pixel art style!

-A soundtrack played live composed by misotanni!

Controls

Pretty much the entire game is played using the mouse. However, sometimes you will have to use WASD, the Arrow Keys or E to control objects in the environment.
